Blog.post: HELLLLLLLLLLO!!!!! TO........JUSTIN !!!!goodluck for all your work!!do it one by one okay??dun wory..if you ever ever need wake up call or wht..jus tel me!!!i wil help you..count on me brother!!oh btw..dun worry about your cousin!i tink his dancing is pretty FUNNKKYY..*shakes my leg and snaps my fingers vigourously* hahah okay..i wil help you tink of a plan to deal wit him yea?in the meantime..jus try to concentrate and bear wit him.im sure wit our combined witch and wizard secret powerful chants..we wil be able to chase him off!!oh yea we hafta curse al our tchers tog ..they are too swuash. dam act i tink the way your cousin dance is DAM GROOVY AND FUNKYY!!ITS SO FUNNNNY!!!!better den the water dance** teehee.. HULLLLLLLLLO!!! TO...........ALVIN..MY DEAR CUTE WHITE ONE . teehee tis is so fun..alvin..you are so cute..so cute i hafta wrap you tightly in furry towel.haha dam we can nvr wake up on time to study tis is bad you noe.haha yea we shd jus relax and take a chill pill *giggle giggle* yea we are cool..we tk chill pill..muahahaha.oh anw..jus wana say tanks white one.for everything:) *winks* you haf been a realli great mice partner.im so proud wen you sed i was strong okay.. :) teeheeYES!!check out my muscle!!its firm...sweeet..mm..dam we hafta come up wit more games to play..im so bored..bored..you hear me???yea..cant wait for kenny rogers...CORN MUFFINS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!ohyea we stil decided on a place to get drunk..i reali reali feel lik drinking now man.white one!!ure supp to scold me and ask me to study!!dun forget your job!!my future is in your hands!!okay anw..er......you...are.........er............ CUTE !!!muahhaahah * strokes your bobby head lightly * HEEEEEEYYYYYYY!! TO.............AIDAN..MY bEST BB SISTA!! heehee ..tis is a fun blog huh..all dots dots and more dots.oh..you dun hafta worry bout me okay???im fine!!im strong!!im reali very strong..so dun worry..okay?tanks anyway..you haf been a reali great sista.and i mean a really good and sensitive sista!but wen ure tired you can reali go slp you noe..dun hafta keep me company...im fine!!im not a weeper lik you.you ah..better not weep too much ..no good for your well-endowed breasts .its God's gift dat ure blessed wit such wonderful figure..yea better tank justin man..oh you ..shuai ge..even the office secretary is crazy bout you..*whistles* hot stuf huh..oh pls..tkcare of your leg can..injured alr den pls stop playg bball.dun let me nag lik a lao nainai.oh rem ?!!? ure supp to mk cheese cake for me!!! where is it?!!huh!!huh!!im demandind for it now..now!!you hear me??yes..serve it to me in a pink powerpuff plate.tsktsk.lets plan for sumthg exciting..bahh i reali dun feel lik studying..rem you are supp to nag at me?yea..you mus!!can you sing to me "george of the jungle song" tink it nice!!i laf that song.anw..tkcare..dun fall sick sista!!so weak..so weak... i hafta go cook some oats for you. .i hafta.. DUN YOU DARE STOP ME ..DUN YOU DARE.....or i'll..i'll make you eat more cookie crisp!!*barkk** signing offf............................. JIE LUN+ JIE LUN+ JIE LUN+ JIE LUN+ JIE LUN+ JIE LUN!!!!!

muahaha.blogging is so fun.dam how do you add the tagboard ting.shit.i tink i jus got myself some stupid free one mth music download??crap..whts dat?!*hits my brain* ohwell..eh...i jus rem!!!!!freeLANcers..we had our own anthem right??whts it?dam..i tink i was the composer and i forgot..*curses my empty nut head* okay..no worries no fear..i wil go tink of our motto and song again!!den we can sing it tog!!!muahhahhaha.LIFE IS SO SIAN!i need some excitement.

i hate tan choon yan . freakin fat bird head.she shd jus lik burn in hades or bounce her way to mars.i shd reali try finding her neck some day.its lik buried beneath her thick layers of fats.bloody round fat ball.DUN WOORY YING CHIN!!!ure not the roundiest.muahah.the freeLANcers shd come up a plan to deal wit that fat bird.or....we can nvr eat in the canteen in peace.bahhhhhhhhhh .hahah yepp ..tis is our second mission!!our first mission is....*xun zao zhou jielun* i'l brief you al more abt that!!! *screams lik a mad ass* miss poh!!!! im so so so scaredd of her!!!! she is chio but..but..why mus she be so fierce?!?!?!?bahhh i almost cried wen she questioned me okay!!!!mama!!!im so scared of econs..poor me and houshun..haha always trembling during econs lessons.i cant tk it man..she..fierce lik lion.roar.... gopal saraswati. stupid retard snail.we hafta buy her skates durin tcher's day..its amazing how can one walk so slow..snailin here and dere.ah ma.always pick on our clique...DAM!!EVEN SEPERATE US!!!!now gp is so boring..we cant eat tog anymore.. freeLANcers .. our third mission is on the way..target: saraswati. bahh..freeLANcers haf so many missions.we hafta save the world wit our LANcer power!!*raises my hand up*

ooh!my first blog!!muahaha wht a retarded font.ohwell..dam i tink blogs are stupid.mm..oh stupid GL!!!YOU CAN LEAVE MSG FOR ME NOW..NOW!!!!!!YOU HEAR ME????teehee..you peehole.ha i find so much pleasure in bullying you.jiam!!!!pris!!!!nothing...jus wana irritate you..vanessa weiting!!tanks for al your letters okay?mm..i reali appreciate those cute lil letters!oh.. freeLANcer...we are on an impt and un-impossible mission.pls contact me asap wen you receive tis urgent msg..over..we hafta............................ EXTERMINATE!!! for mission details..we wil have a meeting to discuss about it.meetg venue wil be known later.meeting date wil be confidential.we are mysterious..............okay signing off~~~

wht the hell???some ass actually complained to mdm loke abt me?!?????? HUH!??!? i tot im always lik hiding in some corner in sch..who in the world wld wanna complain bout me???! wahh im so pissed and i dun noe i got complained for wht?!!!? wahh who is tht bitch! im gna slice her ass into three pieces. great now she is tinkg of kicking me out.jus great.i mus go to her wit a parents' letter to explain my absence.dam i totally feel lik hecking tht 5% of the uni entry ting. its only 5%..ass.but i noe i wil regret in future.wht the hell..so f***ing pissed now.

pris!!i feel so sad for you!!you get terrorised by tht woman everyday and she is so disgusting!!!!she nvr spare a tot for you all and jus keep bugging you all.its not as though you all dun haf a life lik her.why are you stil so nice to her??ignore her la..be lik jiam.haha..okay thts a lil over but yea.it wil be good to you.she wil drive you nuts one day i tel you.tht crazy woman.rem the logical reasoning i was telling you..in the canteen?yepp the doc squeezed her head a lil too hard and therefore her absorbing skills are gone...poor you..mus bear wit this sort of ppl.mm..chill babe!jus rem tht i wil be here for you we you need to scream or curse!!and luckily pw is only for this yr.wahh im so tired and dead for the ma test!i hvnt even touch anything and im so tired cos i slept at 2 and woke up at 4:17am.thts crazyy.okay nvm i wil go get some slp now. zzzzzZZZzzz

i jus drop hist and i feel so..naked.if i dun do well for my promos,thts the end of me.so...scary.there is really nothing to look forward to in school except more work and terrorism. *shudders* . for the past 2weeks,i've been slpg for like 3-4 hrs everyday.. im trying to mk myself tired.its kinda workin cos im really freakin tired by 11pm everynite. nad my cramps are very very bad recently.shit!! i tink there is sumthg seriously wrong wit my body. the way i drink water..is the ultimate.i dun drink by cups..but i drinks by pails.and amazingly...my lips stil crack and i'l stil be very thirsty.mm..maybe i'l die soon :)) thts cool. oh whtever. pw is really a sin..SIN i tel you.the person who made it compulsory for all jc students can jolly well go burn in hades and eat only taupok for the rest of his life.. *barks* mm..i jus heard something today.at first i was kinda affected by it but im alright now la.im so tired tht i dun haf the strength to tink abt it.i mean i do miss him alot alot.but :((( oh white one!! please please please dun feel bad..or i will feel very very very terrible also.i mean..i dun want to see you feel so bad.im reali really reali okay. *sulks* dam i feel so bad. its lik i haf been troubling you so longg cos of my shits then..aiyaa i also dno how to say la.whtever it is, im so sorry!! *looks down guiltily* please..erm..dun tink its your fault!cos im reali okay!haiya i also dno wht to say.. dam and i haf a ma test tmr.i spend the whole stupid night doin pw cos ma is so so boring.im gna be so so so dead durin my test tmr :((( i hte tis ass feelin okay.and now tht i drop hist!!wahh i feel lik a sinner..feel lik stabbing myself ten times in the ass.but im realli reali tired now *sulks* and i noe i wun do well for my chi and gp test.i screwed the both tests.mama!! i wanna cry.all these are part of the 60% ting. bahh..
i miss you lik crazy. im drivin myself crazy tinkin about you day and night.

im so freakin sian wit life sch and every every ting.there are always so much shits cumg your way.im disgusted wit all tis crap.why cant god jus put me by his side up in heaven.bahh..i want to cry.why tings turn out lik tis.why.im not happy.im not happy.im not happy.my hart feels totally dead.i cant feel anything now.jus wana hide in my room all day.and life is always so idiotic.wen something wrong is happening to you..something even worse wil happen aft tht.i reali dun lik it wen my frens are unhappy.cos wen my frens are unhappy,i wil be even more not happy.and now im havin some shitty probs myself,plus my frens are unhappy..plus..my al-so-lovely econs teacher.life is jus so f***ed up at the moment.i wanna cry til i turn blind..shout til i become dumb.im so sad.im so sad.im so sad.im so so sad.normally i can find alot of ways to cheer myself up..cos i see no point in makin myself sad and dwellin in my own misery.but tis time.i reali cant find any way to stop crying.and i dun wana feel lik tis.its totally crap.and i dun wana affect my frens' mood.and i dun wana disturb my frens anymore,i haf bothered em enuff.i feel bad cos they spend so much time wit me,tryg to cheer me up, but im stil lik this.so dead and liveless.im so so sorry!!i dun wana be lik tht also..hurhur.......*sobs* but i cant get it off my mind.i dno wht am i hanging on for also.dam.im tokg shit.im shit..i tok shit.life is shit,im feelin shit.okay forget it i dno wht am i sayg already.im so tired of tis..so tired of everyting..so tired i wanna tk a longg break frm all tis crap.

sighh.im not feelg any better.im jus freakin tired.i've been tryg to mk myself very very tired.haf been slpg for lik 3-4 hrs for the past few days.im so tired but i refuse to slp.i noe once i lie down on my mattress,i wil start tinkg and go crazily upset.im so tiredd of cryg to slp everynight.i hafta learn to let go.hur...its so painful.it feels lik my hart was sliced into many many million pieces.i gues tis wil take some time.crapp i jus found out sumthg.my..im reali sad.i jus feel lik sulking for the rest of my life.okay whtever..im not gna tink abt it for now.im reali tired. i wana see fireworks so so so so badly.its so pretty.so so so pretty.i tot it mite cheer me up..but esplanade is so crowded..im so lazyy to squeeze.and i also wanted to go see energy..but i haf no mood.shit man..i kinda regret now.its always lik tht..i always regret my actions and decisions.even though i noe i shdnt.bahh i need sumthg to mk me laf....i wil start searching for it..
im crazy bout jay.

STUPID ZHOU JIELUN lik dun wana go..asshole.WHY YOU DUN WANNA GO.idiot..see la..my only chance of tokg to him and spying him GONE..GONE!!his frens al goin la..i hope he wil change his mind!!!but even if dat cool guy dun go..i wil be goin.
